name: rest-api-security
description: demo poc to experiment with securities, malicious code injection and sql injection through body of a rest api call. in contrast to the popular package helmet that takes care of the headers and other overheads, this poc is focused on exploring the security in the body.
author: Atanu Sarkar <mratanusarkar@gmail.com> (https://github.com/mratanusarkar)
